CustomField.formula: CASE( Category__c , 'Management', 15, 'Age of Business', 10, 'Market', 10, 'Credit History',10, 'Capacity of the Owners (Staying Power)',5, 'Home Ownership',5, 'Financial Debt Leverage',5, 'Working Capital',5, 'Repayment Ability',15, 'Security',15, 'Industry',5, 0)
CustomField.label: Category Weight
